short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple full name extraction and conversion to emails/usernames. Utilizes the 'people' tab of the target company on LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creepedin works by reading updates from the correct divs on LinkedIn's 'People' page. Navigate to the company page of your choice and scroll down until all employees are displayed. The list will populate automatically. (If it doesn't start populating, refresh the page.)
